O

Option - Interface in net.xeoh.plugins.base
Used as optional arguments to classes.
OptionCapabilities - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.getplugin
Specifies the method should only consider plugins satisfying all the given Capabilities.
OptionCapabilities(String...) - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.getplugin.OptionCapabilities
Returns plugins that matches all given capabilites.
OptionHandler<T extends Option> - Interface in net.xeoh.plugins.base.util
Handles options.
OptionInstantRequest - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.subscribe
Requests the InformationBroker to call subscribe() to obtain the current value instantly.
OptionInstantRequest() - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.subscribe.OptionInstantRequest
 
OptionPluginSelector<P extends Plugin> - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.getplugin
Passes a plugin selector as an option.
OptionPluginSelector(PluginSelector<P>) - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.getplugin.OptionPluginSelector
Creates a new selectop option with the given selelector.
OptionReportAfter - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.addpluginsfrom
Asks the PluginManager to print a report after this plugin addition.
OptionReportAfter() - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.addpluginsfrom.OptionReportAfter
 
OptionSearchAround - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.addpluginsfrom
When JSPF searches for plugins, use the given class as the initial exploration point for a classpath search.
OptionSearchAround(Class<?>) - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.base.options.addpluginsfrom.OptionSearchAround
 
OptionSilentPublish - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.publish
Requests the InformationBroker to publish() to update the item silently, i.e., without calling any registered subscriber.

For example, to update a value silently, you could write:

informationBroker.publish(item, new OptionSilentPublish());
OptionSilentPublish() - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.informationbroker.options.publish.OptionSilentPublish
 
OptionUtils<T extends Option> - Class in net.xeoh.plugins.base.util
Handles options within plugin methods.
OptionUtils(T...) - Constructor for class net.xeoh.plugins.base.util.OptionUtils
Creates a new options array.
